```{r, message = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(stringr)
source("helper.R")
```

```{r}
raw_data <- read.csv("data/master.csv", stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
```

```{r}
q <- "How.many.days.do.you.use.cannabis.per.week...Please.select.one."
t <- "How many days do you use cannabis per week? (Please select one)"
q_data <- get_single_selection(data = raw_data, q.name = q)
q_n <- length(unique(q_data$id))
```

```{r}
q_plot<- clean_single_select(q_data)
r <- plot_single_select(q_plot)
r
```

```{r}
ggsave(filename = 'q50_cannabis_days_per_wk.png', plot = r, device = 'png')
write.csv(q_plot, 'q50_cannabis_days_per_wk_144.csv', row.names = FALSE)
```

```{r}
qf_data <- q_data %>%
  filter(response == "Multiple times every day")
```

```{r}
qf_all_data <- 
  qf_data %>%
  inner_join(q_data, by = "id")

qf_n <- length(unique(qf_all_data$id))
```

```{r}
q_plot <- clean_single_select_f(qf_all_data)
r <- plot_single_select_f(q_plot)
r
```

```{r}
ggsave(filename = 'q50_cannabis_days_per_wk.png', plot = r, device = 'png')
write.csv(q_plot, 'q50_cannabis_days_per_wk_n#.csv', row.names = FALSE)
```
